buttonText.description: Button text notifies that it navigates a user to a "Sign in" page

text.description:
"Sign in to enjoy more"

Text that appears if user is not singed in

headingText.description: Error message that appears if Certificate Page has failed to load

generic.description: There are two versions of the messages.

getItOn.description: Text for get it on Paskoocheh Button

appleAppStore.description: Text for option Apple App Store

downloadFromChromeWebStore.description: Text for option Download from Chrome web store

downloadFromEmail.description: Text for option Download from email

downloadFromFireFoxWebStore.description: Text for option Download from firefox web store

downloadFromMicrosoftStore.description: Text for option Download from microsoft store

downloadFromWebsite.description: Text for option Download from website

title.description: Title (used for heading and page title).

youAlreadySignedIn.description: Text for You’re already signed in message

message.description: Text for user that create account from referral

generic.description: These are the default versions of the error messages. In some cases they’re overridden with more specific messages.

404.description:
Page not found error.

Displayed if a non-existent URL is loaded.

500.description:
Server error.

Used if an existent URL is loaded, but something goes wrong while loading it (e.g. the backend is down)

a11yLabel.description: Accessibility label for two footer link lists.

description.description: Text description to subscribe for newsletters

email.description: Placeholder text that describes the expected value of a input field

userMenuLabel.description: Label for user icon when user is signed in. When clicked will open the user menu.

headingPrefix.description:
Text that appears before name of active category in popular apps heading.

In English, this is the "Popular" segment of:

"[Popular] Entertainment Apps"

headingSuffix.description:
Text that appears after the name of active category in popular apps heading.

In English, this is the "Apps" segment of:

"Popular Entertainment [Apps]"

description.description: Text for How points work description

heading.description: Text for How points work heading

a11yTitle.description: Accessibility title for the mobile navigation

closeA11yLabel.description: Label text for mobile navigation menu button for accessibility purposes

openA11yLabel.description: Label text for mobile navigation menu button for accessibility purposes

pageTitleAndSiteTitle.description:
Page title + site title (e.g. About us — Paskoocheh).

Used if the page has a title.

siteDescription.description:
Description of entire site.

Used for pages that don’t have a dedicated description, and for the homepage.

a11yLabel.description:
Menu button accessibility label, to give the user context for what the select is for.

\{platformName\} is replaced by the platform name.

messageHtml.description:
Text for message (includes HTML for email link).

- \{rewardEmail\} is replaced by   NEXT_PUBLIC_REWARD_REDEMPTION_EMAIL_ADDRESS

title.description: Title (used for heading and page title).
Title (used for heading and page title).

earnedPoints.description: Text for weekly challenge result with earned points

notEarnedPoints.description: Text for weekly challenge result with no earned points

notYetCompleted.description: Text for not yet completed weekly challenge

a11yAnnouncements.description: Accessibility announcements. Used when loading new items in the listing pages.

loadingNewItemsComplete.description:
Read by screen reader when finished loading new list items.

"\{count\}" is replaced by the number of new items loaded.

loadingNewItemsStarted.description: Read by screen reader when beginning to load new list items.

all.description: "All" string used in various places (e.g. category/topic nav lists).

network.description: Displayed if form submission failed due to network error.

unknown.description: Displayed if form submission failed due to unknown error.

noJsMessage.description:
Message explaining why interactive features require JavaScript and a modern browser to work.

Displays if the user has disabled JavaScript, or if they’re using an older browser that doesn’t support the site’s JavaScript code.

skipToMainContent.description: Skip to main content accessibility text. Used for hidden accessibility shortcuts.

setRatingAriaLabel.description:
Accessibility label for rating star when clicking a new rating.

\{rating\} is replaced by the star’s rating number (1/2/3/4/5)

unsetRatingAriaLabel.description: Accessibility label for rating star when clicking the current rating’s star to unset the rating.

A11yShortcutPreset.description:
Accessibility shortcut preset.

These accessibility shortcuts appear when using keyboard or screen reader navigation.

AppAndroidInstallButton.description: App detail page Get it on Paskoocheh Button

AppShareAndSupportLinks.description: App page share and support links (at top corner).

AppStatsDetails.description: App page top stats area (containing review count, download count, supported platform version, etc.).

ClientSideErrorFallback.description: Error view that appears if there’s an unrecoverable error while the browser is rendering the page.

ErrorPageContent.description:
Error page.

Appears for non-existent pages, and when a page encounters an error.

FooterNav.description: Footer navigation links (“Contact Us” and “More Information”).

IndexPageLoadingUi.description: Index page “load more” link, loading indicator, and error messages.

MobileHeaderNavDropdown.description: Mobile nav open/close button. Mobile navigation menu.

NoResultsIllustrationAndMessage.description:
No results illustration and message.

Appears on index pages when no matched items are found.

PageMeta.description: Page metadata (including SEO and social media tags).

writeYourMessageHeading.description: Text for Write your message heading
